sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_ACHD (PROD_ID, AC_CLOSING_CHRG, MISC_SERV_CHRG, STAT_CHRG, AC_DEBIT_INT, PENAL_INT, AC_CREDIT_INT, CLEARING_INT, EXPIRY_INT, EXCESS_LIMIT, CHQBK_ISSUE_CHRG, STOP_PAY_CHRG, CHQ_RET_CHRG_OUTWARD, CHQ_RET_CHRG_INWARD, FOLIO_CHRG_AC ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #acClosingChrg:VARCHAR#, #miscServChrg:VARCHAR#, #statChrg:VARCHAR#, #acDebitInt:VARCHAR#, #penalInt:VARCHAR#, #acCreditInt:VARCHAR#, #clearingInt:VARCHAR#, #expiryInt:VARCHAR#, #excessLimit:VARCHAR#, #chqbkIssueChrg:VARCHAR#, #stopPayChrg:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgOutward:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgInward:VARCHAR#, #folioChrgAc:VARCHAR#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_ACHD SET
AC_CLOSING_CHRG = #acClosingChrg:VARCHAR#, MISC_SERV_CHRG = #miscServChrg:VARCHAR#, STAT_CHRG = #statChrg:VARCHAR#, AC_DEBIT_INT = #acDebitInt:VARCHAR#, PENAL_INT = #penalInt:VARCHAR#, AC_CREDIT_INT = #acCreditInt:VARCHAR#, CLEARING_INT = #clearingInt:VARCHAR#, EXPIRY_INT = #expiryInt:VARCHAR#, EXCESS_LIMIT = #excessLimit:VARCHAR#, CHQBK_ISSUE_CHRG = #chqbkIssueChrg:VARCHAR#, STOP_PAY_CHRG = #stopPayChrg:VARCHAR#, CHQ_RET_CHRG_OUTWARD = #chqRetChrgOutward:VARCHAR#, CHQ_RET_CHRG_INWARD = #chqRetChrgInward:VARCHAR#, FOLIO_CHRG_AC = #folioChrgAc:VARCHAR# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
DELETE FROM ADVANCES_PROD_ACHD WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ADVANCES_PROD_ACHD WHERE PROD_ID = #value:VARCHAR#

INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_ACPARAM (PROD_ID, CHK_ALLOWED, DISC_EOL_PERC, NUMBER_PATTERN, LAST_AC_NO, STAT_FREQ, NO_FREE_CHQ_LEAVES, FREE_CHQ_PERIOD, FREE_CHQ_START, LIMIT_DEF_ALLOWED, TEMP_OD_ALLOWED, STAFF_AC_OPENED, DEBIT_UNCLEAR_APPL, CREDIT_UNCLEAR_APPL, ISSUE_TOKEN, ALLOW_WD_SLIP, MAX_AMT_ALLOWED ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #chkAllowed:VARCHAR#, #discEolPerc:NUMERIC#, #numberPattern:VARCHAR#, #lastAcNo:VARCHAR#, #statFreq:NUMERIC#, #noFreeChqLeaves:NUMERIC#, #freeChqPeriod:NUMERIC#, #freeChqStart:DATE#, #limitDefAllowed:VARCHAR#, #tempOdAllowed:VARCHAR#, #staffAcOpened:VARCHAR#, #debitUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, #creditUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, #issueToken:VARCHAR#, #allowWdSlip:VARCHAR#, #maxAmtAllowed:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_ACPARAM SET
CHK_ALLOWED = #chkAllowed:VARCHAR#, DISC_EOL_PERC = #discEolPerc:NUMERIC#, NUMBER_PATTERN = #numberPattern:VARCHAR#, LAST_AC_NO = #lastAcNo:VARCHAR#, STAT_FREQ = #statFreq:NUMERIC#, NO_FREE_CHQ_LEAVES = #noFreeChqLeaves:NUMERIC#, FREE_CHQ_PERIOD = #freeChqPeriod:NUMERIC#, FREE_CHQ_START = #freeChqStart:DATE#, LIMIT_DEF_ALLOWED = #limitDefAllowed:VARCHAR#, TEMP_OD_ALLOWED = #tempOdAllowed:VARCHAR#, STAFF_AC_OPENED = #staffAcOpened:VARCHAR#, DEBIT_UNCLEAR_APPL = #debitUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, CREDIT_UNCLEAR_APPL = #creditUnclearAppl:VARCHAR#, ISSUE_TOKEN = #issueToken:VARCHAR#, ALLOW_WD_SLIP = #allowWdSlip:VARCHAR#, MAX_AMT_ALLOWED = #maxAmtAllowed:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
DELETE FROM ADVANCES_PROD_ACPARAM WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ADVANCES_PROD_ACPARAM WHERE PROD_ID = #value:VARCHAR#

INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_CHARGES (PROD_ID, AC_CLOSING_CHRG, MISC_SERV_CHRG, STAT_CHRG, STAT_CHRG_RATE, CHQBK_ISSUED_CHRG, CHQBK_ISSUED_CHRG_PER, STOP_PAY_CHRG, STOP_PAY_CHRG_RATE, FOLIO_CHRG_APPL, LAST_FOLIO_CHRGON, NO_ENTRIES_PER_FOLIO, NEXT_FOLIO_DUEDATE, RATE_PER_FOLIO, TO_CHRG_ON, FOLIO_CHRG_APPLFREQ, TO_COLLECT_FOLIOCHRG, TO_COLLECT_CHRG_ON, INCOMP_FOLIO_ROUNDOFF, PROC_CHRG, PROC_CHRG_PER, PROC_CHRG_AMT, COMMIT_CHRG, COMMIT_CHRG_PER, COMMIT_CHRG_AMT ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #acClosingChrg:NUMERIC#, #miscServChrg:NUMERIC#, #statChrg:VARCHAR#, #statChrgRate:NUMERIC#, #chqbkIssuedChrg:VARCHAR#, #chqbkIssuedChrgPer:NUMERIC#, #stopPayChrg:VARCHAR#, #stopPayChrgRate:NUMERIC#, #folioChrgAppl:VARCHAR#, #lastFolioChrgon:DATE#, #noEntriesPerFolio:NUMERIC#, #nextFolioDuedate:DATE#, #ratePerFolio:NUMERIC#, #toChrgOn:VARCHAR#, #folioChrgApplfreq:NUMERIC#, #toCollectFoliochrg:VARCHAR#, #toCollectChrgOn:VARCHAR#, #incompFolioRoundoff:NUMERIC#, #procChrg:VARCHAR#, #procChrgPer:NUMERIC#, #procChrgAmt:NUMERIC#, #commitChrg:VARCHAR#, #commitChrgPer:NUMERIC#, #commitChrgAmt:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_CHARGES SET
AC_CLOSING_CHRG = #acClosingChrg:NUMERIC#, MISC_SERV_CHRG = #miscServChrg:NUMERIC#, STAT_CHRG = #statChrg:VARCHAR#, STAT_CHRG_RATE = #statChrgRate:NUMERIC#, CHQBK_ISSUED_CHRG = #chqbkIssuedChrg:VARCHAR#, CHQBK_ISSUED_CHRG_PER = #chqbkIssuedChrgPer:NUMERIC#, STOP_PAY_CHRG = #stopPayChrg:VARCHAR#, STOP_PAY_CHRG_RATE = #stopPayChrgRate:NUMERIC#, FOLIO_CHRG_APPL = #folioChrgAppl:VARCHAR#, LAST_FOLIO_CHRGON = #lastFolioChrgon:DATE#, NO_ENTRIES_PER_FOLIO = #noEntriesPerFolio:NUMERIC#, NEXT_FOLIO_DUEDATE = #nextFolioDuedate:DATE#, RATE_PER_FOLIO = #ratePerFolio:NUMERIC#, TO_CHRG_ON = #toChrgOn:VARCHAR#, FOLIO_CHRG_APPLFREQ = #folioChrgApplfreq:NUMERIC#, TO_COLLECT_FOLIOCHRG = #toCollectFoliochrg:VARCHAR#, TO_COLLECT_CHRG_ON = #toCollectChrgOn:VARCHAR#, INCOMP_FOLIO_ROUNDOFF = #incompFolioRoundoff:NUMERIC#, PROC_CHRG = #procChrg:VARCHAR#, PROC_CHRG_PER = #procChrgPer:NUMERIC#, PROC_CHRG_AMT = #procChrgAmt:NUMERIC#, COMMIT_CHRG = #commitChrg:VARCHAR#, COMMIT_CHRG_PER = #commitChrgPer:NUMERIC#, COMMIT_CHRG_AMT = #commitChrgAmt:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
DELETE FROM ADVANCES_PROD_CHARGES WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ADVANCES_PROD_CHARGES WHERE PROD_ID = #value:VARCHAR#

INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_CHQCHRG (PROD_ID, CHQ_RET_CHRGTYPE, CHQ_RET_CHRGAMT, CHQ_RET_CHRGRATE ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgtype:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgamt:VARCHAR#, #chqRetChrgrate:NUMERIC#)

CHQ_RET_CHRGTYPE = #chqRetChrgtype:VARCHAR#, CHQ_RET_CHRGAMT = #chqRetChrgamt:VARCHAR#, CHQ_RET_CHRGRATE = #chqRetChrgrate:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#

INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_INTPAY (PROD_ID, CR_INT_PAID, APPL_CRINT_RATE, CR_INT_CALCFREQ, CR_INT_APPLFREQ, LAST_INTCALC_DTCR, LAST_INTAPPL_DTCR, CR_COMP, CR_INT_COMPFREQ, CR_PROD_ROUNDOFF, CR_INT_ROUNDOFF, CALC_CRITERIA, PROD_FREQ, ADDI_INT_STAFF, ADDI_INT_STAFF_PER,MIN_CREDIT_INT_AMOUNT ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #crIntPaid:VARCHAR#, #applCrintRate:NUMERIC#, #crIntCalcfreq:NUMERIC#, #crIntApplfreq:NUMERIC#, #lastIntcalcDtcr:DATE#, #lastIntapplDtcr:DATE#, #crComp:VARCHAR#, #crIntCompfreq:NUMERIC#, #crProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #crIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #calcCriteria:VARCHAR#, #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, #addiIntStaff:VARCHAR#, #addiIntStaffPer:NUMERIC#,#creditMinInterestAmt:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_INTPAY SET
CR_INT_PAID = #crIntPaid:VARCHAR#, APPL_CRINT_RATE = #applCrintRate:NUMERIC#, CR_INT_CALCFREQ = #crIntCalcfreq:NUMERIC#, CR_INT_APPLFREQ = #crIntApplfreq:NUMERIC#, LAST_INTCALC_DTCR = #lastIntcalcDtcr:DATE#, LAST_INTAPPL_DTCR = #lastIntapplDtcr:DATE#, CR_COMP = #crComp:VARCHAR#, CR_INT_COMPFREQ = #crIntCompfreq:NUMERIC#, CR_PROD_ROUNDOFF = #crProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, CR_INT_ROUNDOFF = #crIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, CALC_CRITERIA = #calcCriteria:VARCHAR#, PROD_FREQ = #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, ADDI_INT_STAFF = #addiIntStaff:VARCHAR#, ADDI_INT_STAFF_PER = #addiIntStaffPer:NUMERIC#, MIN_CREDIT_INT_AMOUNT=#creditMinInterestAmt:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
DELETE FROM ADVANCES_PROD_INTPAY WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ADVANCES_PROD_INTPAY WHERE PROD_ID = #value:VARCHAR#

INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_INTREC (PROD_ID, DEBIT_INT_CHARGED, MIN_DEBITINT_RATE, MAX_DEBITINT_RATE, MIN_DEBITINT_AMT, MAX_DEBITINT_AMT, DEBITINT_CALC_FREQ, DEBITINT_APPL_FREQ, DEBIT_COMP_REQ, DEBITINT_COMP_FREQ, DEBIT_PROD_ROUNDOFF, DEBIT_INT_ROUNDOFF, LAST_INTCALC_DTDEBIT, LAST_INTAPPL_DTDEBIT, PROD_FREQ, UNCLEAR_ADV_INTCHARG, PLR_RATE_APPL, PLR_RATE, PLR_APPL_FROM, PLR_APPL_NEWAC, PLR_APPL_EXISTAC, PLR_APPL_SANCFROM, EOL_APPL, PENAL_APPL, LIMIT_EXPIRY_INT, PENAL_INT_RATE ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #debitIntCharged:VARCHAR#, #minDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, #maxDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, #minDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, #maxDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, #debitintCalcFreq:NUMERIC#, #debitintApplFreq:NUMERIC#, #debitCompReq:VARCHAR#, #debitintCompFreq:NUMERIC#, #debitProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #debitIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #lastIntcalcDtdebit:DATE#, #lastIntapplDtdebit:DATE#, #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, #unclearAdvIntcharg:VARCHAR#, #plrRateAppl:VARCHAR#, #plrRate:NUMERIC#, #plrApplFrom:DATE#, #plrApplNewac:VARCHAR#, #plrApplExistac:VARCHAR#, #plrApplSancfrom:DATE#, #eolAppl:VARCHAR#, #penalAppl:VARCHAR#, #limitExpiryInt:VARCHAR#, #penalIntRate:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_INTREC SET
DEBIT_INT_CHARGED = #debitIntCharged:VARCHAR#, MIN_DEBITINT_RATE = #minDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, MAX_DEBITINT_RATE = #maxDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, MIN_DEBITINT_AMT = #minDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, MAX_DEBITINT_AMT = #maxDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, DEBITINT_CALC_FREQ = #debitintCalcFreq:NUMERIC#, DEBITINT_APPL_FREQ = #debitintApplFreq:NUMERIC#, DEBIT_COMP_REQ = #debitCompReq:VARCHAR#, DEBITINT_COMP_FREQ = #debitintCompFreq:NUMERIC#, DEBIT_PROD_ROUNDOFF = #debitProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, DEBIT_INT_ROUNDOFF = #debitIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, LAST_INTCALC_DTDEBIT = #lastIntcalcDtdebit:DATE#, LAST_INTAPPL_DTDEBIT = #lastIntapplDtdebit:DATE#, PROD_FREQ = #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, UNCLEAR_ADV_INTCHARG = #unclearAdvIntcharg:VARCHAR#, PLR_RATE_APPL = #plrRateAppl:VARCHAR#, PLR_RATE = #plrRate:NUMERIC#, PLR_APPL_FROM = #plrApplFrom:DATE#, PLR_APPL_NEWAC = #plrApplNewac:VARCHAR#, PLR_APPL_EXISTAC = #plrApplExistac:VARCHAR#, PLR_APPL_SANCFROM = #plrApplSancfrom:DATE#, EOL_APPL = #eolAppl:VARCHAR#, PENAL_APPL = #penalAppl:VARCHAR#, LIMIT_EXPIRY_INT = #limitExpiryInt:VARCHAR#, PENAL_INT_RATE = #penalIntRate:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
DELETE FROM ADVANCES_PROD_INTREC WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ADVANCES_PROD_INTREC WHERE PROD_ID = #value:VARCHAR#
